title: Intern and Student Developer
info: At OnlinePlus I worked as a WordPress developer and graphic designer. Here I led the way in developing fluid and responsive websites.

title: Owner
info: Self-employment as a freelancer with a focus on the frontend.

title: Web Developer
info: At Create Inside I functioned as a Drupal developer, front-end developer, graphic designer, consultant and teacher.

title: Front-End Developer
info: At Escenic I work in the R&D department where I have a prominent role in the development of the in-house product CUE.

title: Front-End Developer
info: In February 2020, Escenic and CCI merged under a new company brand, Stibo DX. As for me, I'm still the same.
